description:
Tokido Saya is a girl from Riki`s school. In the daytime, she is a popular girl in her class due to her attractive face and figure, though is known to be a natural airhead. However, at night, she can be found at the school wandering around in order to protect a "treasure" from those she calls the "darkness executives", and even has to fight them for it.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Tokido Saya
